_header: All hail Mary full of grace
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — six 8-line stanzas

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
[A]ll hayle Mary ful of graceOure lord of hevene is with
                    the…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…Wele art thow bounde so for to doSith Aungelis and devils
                    knele therto
BLAdd34360.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 45-6.
